titulo: Otro Titulo de prueba en JSON 2
contenido: To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it? But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure?
resumen: undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it?
